item.title: Astro mdx 格式测试
item.content:encoded:
Hello, world!

> Some notable things in a block quote!

Autolink literals

www.example.com, https://example.com, and contact@example.com.

Footnote

A note[^1]

[^1]: Big note.

Strikethrough

one or two tildes.

Table

a b c d

Tasklist

  • to do
  • done

图片集

import ImageGrid from '@/components/ImageGrid.astro'; export const images = [ { src: "https://images-oss.guanglai.me/2025/996fe1a75ee7fe09e0a9a8eaf7307085.webp", alt: "周日世纪公园的夕阳" }, { src: "https://images-oss.guanglai.me/2025/0950b04941d6808851006545efbe43cc.webp", alt: "屠使用 Z30 拍摄的世纪公园的鸽子" }, { src: "https://images-oss.guanglai.me/2025/e698d6dfc3b191b856120146f0358051.webp", alt: "世纪公园夜晚长椅的树枝、月亮和星星" }, { src: "https://images-oss.guanglai.me/2025/f47b28d319ca864f6c5c76365277b9dc.webp", alt: "三月初世纪公园的梅花" }, { src: "https://images-oss.guanglai.me/2025/d38a03a1947fd7880d1b76e0f6ecd80e.webp", alt: "浦东图书馆南边面对公园" }, { src: "https://images-oss.guanglai.me/2025/250117disney-01.jpg", alt: "迪士尼大门" }, { src: "https://images-oss.guanglai.me/2025/250117disney-02.jpg", alt: "晚上的奇幻童话城堡" }, { src: "https://images-oss.guanglai.me/2025/naiyou-250112.jpg", alt: "不过猫不是我的" } ];
